## Replace4 type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Replace4<T, A extends Keys<T>, B extends Keys1<T, A>, C extends Keys2<T, A, B>, D extends Keys3<T, A, B, C>, V> = Without<T, A> & {
```
